newsitem.title: USA: Healt Care REIT to offer 3 mln shares.
newsitem.headline: Healt Care REIT to offer 3 mln shares.

text.p: Health Care REIT Inc said Friday it has filed a prospectus supplement with the Securities and Exchange Commission for an offering of three million shares of common stock at $24.375 per share.

The company expects the closing and delivery will occur on or about March 11. The net proceeds of the offering are estimated at $69 million, which the company says will be used to invest in additional health care properties.

The company has also granted the underwriters of the offering an over-allotment option to purchase up to 450,000 more shares. With the full exercise of that option, the net proceeds to the Company could increase to about $79.4 million.
Health Care REIT is a real estate investment trust, which invests in health care facilities, primarily nursing homes, assisted living facilities and retirement centers.
